title: Residential / Commercial use may be allowed on the part area of the land holding subject to the cond
clause_text: Residential / Commercial use may be allowed on the part area of the land holding subject to the condition that total area of the entire industrial land holding shall be considered for deciding the percentage of the land to be earmarked for public amenity

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
